body_html:
Thanks @benoitsteiner for the suggestion. The gradual strategy makes sense and it should help avoiding the merge conflict.

I have stripped out the commits with style format changes, and enabled --incremental by default. The --incremental could be removed after all files are touched over time.

Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.

body:
Thanks @benoitsteiner for the suggestion. The gradual strategy makes sense and it should help avoiding the merge conflict.

I have stripped out the commits with style format changes, and enabled `--incremental` by default. The `--incremental` could be removed after all files are touched over time.

Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
